description: A shiny black cat tail made out of leather. Whenever you walk, it sways back and forth. You can turn it on for extra enjoyment.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A brown soft and furry cat tail. Whenever you walk, it sways back and forth. You can turn it on for extra enjoyment.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A blob shaped like the tail of a cat that has been made docile. Whenever you walk, it sways back and forth. Make sure to feed your new blob friend!  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A regular maid's white brim with an elegant veil sewn into it, decorated with silver frills. Although it covers your eyes and blocks your vision quite harshly, you can use maid points to turn it on and gain otherwordly sight.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A regular maid's white brim with an elegant veil sewn into it, decorated with silver frills. It is currently see-through.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
